title: I GOT BANNED
body: I GOT BANNED TILL 9th OF MARCH WTF RIOT WHY?!?!?!?! SO PISSED

replies.body: I'm thinking the caps lock had something to do with it.
we know you are. thats why you're banned

Wrong board.

A ban is always accompanied by an email as to why you were banned. Check the email you used to register the account.
